short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple OTP generator using a Base32 secret key.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate secure One-Time Passwords (OTPs) directly in your browser with our OTP Generator Chrome extension. Ideal for two-factor authentication (2FA) and secure access to your favorite online services, this tool ensures you have a fresh, time-based OTP code available whenever you need it.

Key Features:
- Easy Setup: Enter a secret key or phrase to generate unique OTPs.
Instant Access: Click the "Generate" button to quickly get your OTP.
- Time-Based Security: Each code refreshes every 30 seconds, ensuring secure access.
- User-Friendly Interface: A clean, simple layout with a prominent countdown for the next code.
- Copy-to-Clipboard: Easily copy your OTP with one click for quick pasting.
